1600590.name: Fantasy Grounds - Secret Weapons Project
1600590.description:
Secret Weapons Project

Take the gunsmith from Destiny(TM) & Destiny 2(TM), add the creative director of the Starfinder Roleplaying Game, blend in an innovative indie publisher, and what do you get? The Secret Weapons Project.
Jon Weisnewski, James Sutter, and Jonathan G. Nelson combine their creative powers to bring some unique, exclusive gear to your tabletop.
4 distinct and artistically depicted pieces of gear for the Starfinder Roleplaying Game handcrafted by masters of the game are contained within.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Robin Wischnewski
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Starfinder ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
